footer.social: Follow us on our social networks

carousel.para1: Choose from our catalog of excursions
carousel.para3: For contributing with us for a better future

nosotros.main: We help to know the state of our rivers, their ecosystem and their conservation
nosotros.cuerpo1: This page was created with the purpose of educating and teaching anyone about nature, the animals that live within it, and giving importance to how to take care of it, so that others can enjoy it
nosotros.cuerpo2: We also do excursions to clean the forests and the rivers to avoid possible fires, as well as the contamination of our rivers.

eventos.tituloEv2: The most popular events of the moment
eventos.tituloEX2: Excursion to the waterfalls of the Xallas river
eventos.descrp1: Discover this impressive river of Lugo by bicycle
eventos.descrp2: Learn about the history of this river, in addition to contemplating one of the most beautiful waterfalls in Galicia
eventos.descrp3: Discover the Eume river in all its splendor, as well as some of its findings and stories

cita.2tituloCtn: If you have any questions, please contact us

Nuestros_servicios.2titularSrv: The best Galician natural tourism agency!
Nuestros_servicios.bosySrv: Always taking a step forward, offering excursions to the Galician rivers, and learning about the history, ecosystem of each one, as well as promoting recycling and a responsible attitude towards our nature
Nuestros_servicios.textoMotiv1: With all the permits granted by the Xunta de Galicia
Nuestros_servicios.textoMotiv2: To guarantee the safety of our clients during the excursion
Nuestros_servicios.textoMotiv3: With offers, promotions, to make it accessible to everyone
Nuestros_servicios.textoMotiv4: Always willing to help at all times, guaranteeing a perfect excursion
